name: Dice Royale
description:
The upgraded, brand NEW version of the beloved board game! Completely FREE! Joyful games! STOP hesitating and join us!

Easy to play! Easy to win! Welcome to Dice Royale, where you’re guaranteed to feel like a mogul as you win your way to fame and endless fun!

Download NOW and try your luck every day. Besides, the more you play, the more you win! What are you waiting for? Go and roll your LUCK to RAIN!

*This game does not cost any real money.
*Playing this game does not imply future success in “Real Money Gambling”.
